If You Are Reading This There Is No Way That You Could Get This Yourself 
So You Know Me Probably Very Well 
And I Have Nothing to Tell You >
Till Now I Have Been Learning Android Development For More or Less 6 Months 
As You Can See I Am Not The Best *Learner* 
But I Am Not The Worst One Either
Next Year I Am Going To Try to Graduate From University 
Of Course Each Person Has Its Own Opinion 
For Me It Is Total Waste Of Time Just Like This Application 
Anyway Move Forward..
Our Team Consists Of Totally Unrelated Guys
